alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 12:41AM MDT until May 10 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 145 AM MDT. * At 1239 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lucerne to near Fort Lupton, or along a line extending from 4 miles north of Greeley to 23 miles north of Denver, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Greeley, Evans and Lucerne around 1245 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kersey, Galeton, Gill, Hudson, Barnesville and Keenesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
